lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government's banking adviser for the operation was <Banque Privee de Gestion Financiere>, BPGF, owned by French financier Pierre Moussa's <Pallas> group, assisted by Britain's <Hambros Bank Ltd>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SOGENAL is the only French bank in Austria, it set up the first foreign exchange dealing room outside Paris at its Strasbourg headquarters in 1985, and is the only foreign banking subsidiary to be a broker on the Zurich Bourse.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Geronimus said the bank's future aim would be to reinforce its existing strong points, with no major projects planned apart from the opening soon of a Basle branch.
